name: STAX
description: STAX is a colourful, fast-paced tile matching puzzle game inspired by an arcade classic. Better than ever and brought up to date for modern machines and audiences with killer music and gameplay. STAX. It's even fun to say.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Onboard Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 310 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 310 MB available space
